name: Angular-BeastCode
displayName: Angular 2+ TypeScript, Html and ngRx Snippets
description: Angular 2+ TypeScript, Html and ngRx Snippets (updated for v2.1.1)

scripts.build_readme: cat src/README_top.md > README.md; npm run generate; cat src/README_bottom.md >> README.md;
scripts.generate: cat src/snippets.json | grep 'prefix\|description' | sed -e "s/description//" | sed -e "s/prefix//" | sed -e 's/    "": "//' | sed -e 's/",//' | sed -e 'N;s/\n/ | /' | sort  >> README.md
scripts.generate2: cat src/snippets.json | grep 'prefix\|description' | sed -e "s/description//" | sed -e "s/prefix//" | sed -e 's/    "": "//' | sed -e 's/",//'
scripts.build: npm run build_html; npm run build_typescript
